documentsJson.title: Foundations, Hill, 1960
documentsJson.description: A March 1960 NAEB report by the Twin City Area Educational Television Corporation, titled "Upper Midwest Six-State Educational Television Network Survey." The study addresses the administrative, engineering, and programming feasibility of an educational television network in the region, with discussion of factors including costs, program resources, and audience potential.

contributor.name: Twin City Area Educational Television Corporation
